description: Anticipation is high for the 2024 Oscars and the prospects of 'Oppenheimer's lead star Cillian Murphy. Get to know the actor.
title: Everything to Know About Oppenheimer‘s Best Actor Oscar Nominee Cillian Murphy

description: Biden signed a $460 billion package of spending bills approved by the Senate in time to avoid a shutdown of many key federal agencies.
title: Biden Signs Package of Spending Bills Passed by Congress Just Hours Before Shutdown Deadline

description: Irish PM Leo Varadkar conceded defeat as two constitutional amendments he supported were headed toward rejection in early vote tallies.
title: Ireland’s Leader Concedes Defeat in Vote Over Constitutional Amendments About Family

description: Pakistan's lawmakers elected Asif Ali Zardari on Saturday as the country’s president for the second time.
title: Pakistan’s Lawmakers Pick Asif Ali Zardari as the Country’s President For a Second Time

description: Biden addresses his age and touts his record on health, economy, infrastructure, climate change, and abortion rights in a new ad.
title: President Biden Pokes Fun at His Age and Calls Out Trump in New Campaign Ad

description: "Research tells us that changing our clocks burdens us with a host of health and safety problems," writes Lynne Peeples.
title: Daylight Saving Time Is Bad For Our Internal Clocks, Too

description: The COVID-19 pandemic changed the way India watches movies. Bollywood is losing ground to the Telugu, Tamil, and Malayalam film industries.
title: How India Learned to Read Subtitles

description: Longer days are ahead for most of North America as the clocks “spring forward” on Sunday, marking the beginning of daylight saving time.
title: What to Know About How Daylight Saving Time Works in March 2024

description: Against all odds, the 'Game of Thrones' creators' adaptation of Cixin Liu's cerebral, internationally best-selling novel actually works.
title: Netflix’s 3 Body Problem Transforms a Dense Sci-Fi Novel Into a Smart, Gripping Thriller
